dao.other: CREATE TABLE TEST ( COL1 INT NOT NULL COMMENT 'int type' PRIMARY KEY, COL2 DECIMAL(10, 2) DEFAULT 7.70 NOT NULL COMMENT 'decimal(10, 2) type', COL3 DATETIME NULL COMMENT 'datetime type', COL4 VARCHAR(10) NULL COMMENT 'varchar(10) type', COL5 BLOB NULL COMMENT 'blob type' ) COMMENT 'test table';
CREATE TABLE TEST ( COL1 NUMBER NOT NULL CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY, COL2 NUMBER(10, 2) DEFAULT 7.70 NOT NULL, COL3 DATE, COL4 VARCHAR(10), COL5 BLOB )
COMMENT ON TABLE TEST IS 'test table'
COMMENT ON COLUMN TEST.COL1 IS 'NUMBER type'
COMMENT ON COLUMN TEST.COL2 IS 'NUMBER(10, 2) type'
COMMENT ON COLUMN TEST.COL3 IS 'date type'
COMMENT ON COLUMN TEST.COL4 IS 'varchar2(10) type'
COMMENT ON COLUMN TEST.COL5 IS 'blob type'
dao.update: UPDATE TEST SET COL1 = @{COL1} WHERE COL4 = @{COL4}
